name: üõ†Ô∏è Tech Titan
description: Technical expertise and innovation deep dive
prompt_template:
Create a professional podcast interview prep package based on this LinkedIn profile:

Name: {{ $json.body.name }}
Email: {{ $json.body.email }}
LinkedIn Profile Content: {{ $json.body.linkedin_text }}

Generate a TECH TITAN style interview package focusing on:
- Technical architecture and system design
- Innovation and problem-solving methodologies
- Technology leadership and team development
- Industry trends and technical vision

Return ONLY valid JSON in this exact format:
{
  "episode_title": "Technical innovation focused title",
  "guest_bio": "Professional biography emphasizing technical credentials",
  "technical_achievement_1": "Major technical project or architecture success",
  "technical_achievement_2": "Innovation or problem-solving breakthrough",
  "architecture_story": "System design or technical leadership example",
  "question_1": "Deep technical architecture or design question",
  "question_2": "Innovation and problem-solving methodology question",
  "question_3": "Technology trends and future vision question",
  "professional_bio": "Extended technical summary with specific technologies",
  "talking_points": "Key technical discussion points for expert-level interview"
}

Focus on technical depth, innovation mindset, problem-solving excellence, and technology leadership. Make it technically sophisticated and forward-thinking.
